page.title: 04The windmill on Predannack
page.content: We went to see the windmill on Predannack downs. It is a thirty foot high tower built of huge serpentine and elvan stone blocks.It was described as old on a map dated 1695.Now the roof and floor of the building have been destroyed by gales and nobody knows if it ever had sails.In the early nineteenth century it was famous as the haunt of a gang of smugglers and sheep stealers who terrorised the area.Stolen animals were hidden and killed there before being sold or exchanged for smuggled spirits and tobacco at Sheepstealers Cave near Kynance Cove.
